files.patch:
@@ -11,1 +11,2 @@
-  TOOLCHAIN_VERSION: 22
+  TOOLCHAIN_VERSION: 23
+  GRADLE_JAVA_VERSION: 23
@@ -115,1 +116,1 @@
-    - name: 'Setup Java 17'
+    - name: 'Setup Gradle Java'
@@ -118,1 +119,1 @@
-        release: 17
+        release: ${{ env.GRADLE_JAVA_VERSION }}

@@ -41,0 +41,1 @@
+def buildDir = layout.buildDirectory.get()
@@ -52,0 +53,1 @@
+def os_exe_suffix = Os.isFamily(Os.FAMILY_WINDOWS)? ".exe" : "" // needed for some, but not all shells
@@ -61,1 +63,0 @@
-    options.compilerArgs << "--enable-preview"
@@ -63,1 +64,1 @@
-    options.forkOptions.executable = "${jdk22_home}/bin/javac"
+    options.forkOptions.executable = "${jdk22_home}/bin/javac${os_exe_suffix}"
@@ -125,2 +126,2 @@
-        '\\"--enable-native-access=org.openjdk.jextract\\" \\"--enable-preview\""' :
-        '"--enable-native-access=org.openjdk.jextract" "--enable-preview"'
+        '\\"--enable-native-access=org.openjdk.jextract\\"' :
+        '"--enable-native-access=org.openjdk.jextract"'
@@ -235,1 +236,0 @@
-                "-javaoption:--enable-preview",

@@ -18,0 +18,2 @@
+# SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
+#
@@ -58,1 +60,1 @@
-#       https://github.com/gradle/gradle/blob/master/subprojects/plugins/src/main/resources/org/gradle/api/internal/plugins/unixStartScript.txt
+#       https://github.com/gradle/gradle/blob/HEAD/platforms/jvm/plugins-application/src/main/resources/org/gradle/api/internal/plugins/unixStartScript.txt
@@ -83,3 +85,2 @@
-APP_HOME=$( cd "${APP_HOME:-./}" && pwd -P ) || exit
-
-APP_NAME="Gradle"
+# This is normally unused
+# shellcheck disable=SC2034
@@ -87,3 +88,3 @@
-
-# Add default JVM options here. You can also use JAVA_OPTS and GRADLE_OPTS to pass JVM options to this script.
-DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS='"-Xmx64m" "-Xms64m"'
+# Discard cd standard output in case $CDPATH is set (https://github.com/gradle/gradle/issues/25036)
+APP_HOME=$( cd -P "${APP_HOME:-./}" > /dev/null && printf '%s
+' "$PWD" ) || exit
@@ -136,1 +137,3 @@
-    which java >/dev/null 2>&1 || die "ERROR: JAVA_HOME is not set and no 'java' command could be found in your PATH.
+    if ! command -v java >/dev/null 2>&1
+    then
+        die "ERROR: JAVA_HOME is not set and no 'java' command could be found in your PATH.
@@ -140,0 +143,1 @@
+    fi
@@ -146,0 +150,2 @@
+        # In POSIX sh, ulimit -H is undefined. That's why the result is checked to see if it worked.
+        # shellcheck disable=SC2039,SC3045
@@ -152,0 +158,2 @@
+        # In POSIX sh, ulimit -n is undefined. That's why the result is checked to see if it worked.
+        # shellcheck disable=SC2039,SC3045
@@ -196,5 +204,9 @@
-# Collect all arguments for the java command;
-#   * $DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS, $JAVA_OPTS, and $GRADLE_OPTS can contain fragments of
-#     shell script including quotes and variable substitutions, so put them in
-#     double quotes to make sure that they get re-expanded; and
-#   * put everything else in single quotes, so that it's not re-expanded.
+
+# Add default JVM options here. You can also use JAVA_OPTS and GRADLE_OPTS to pass JVM options to this script.
+DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS='"-Xmx64m" "-Xms64m"'
+
+# Collect all arguments for the java command:
+#   * DEFAULT_JVM_OPTS, JAVA_OPTS, JAVA_OPTS, and optsEnvironmentVar are not allowed to contain shell fragments,
+#     and any embedded shellness will be escaped.
+#   * For example: A user cannot expect ${Hostname} to be expanded, as it is an environment variable and will be
+#     treated as '${Hostname}' itself on the command line.
@@ -208,0 +220,6 @@
+# Stop when "xargs" is not available.
+if ! command -v xargs >/dev/null 2>&1
+then
+    die "xargs is not available"
+fi
+

@@ -16,0 +16,2 @@
+@rem SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
+@rem
@@ -17,1 +19,1 @@
-@if "%DEBUG%" == "" @echo off
+@if "%DEBUG%"=="" @echo off
@@ -28,1 +30,2 @@
-if "%DIRNAME%" == "" set DIRNAME=.
+if "%DIRNAME%"=="" set DIRNAME=.
+@rem This is normally unused
@@ -43,1 +46,1 @@
-if "%ERRORLEVEL%" == "0" goto execute
+if %ERRORLEVEL% equ 0 goto execute
@@ -45,5 +48,5 @@
-echo.
-echo ERROR: JAVA_HOME is not set and no 'java' command could be found in your PATH.
-echo.
-echo Please set the JAVA_HOME variable in your environment to match the
-echo location of your Java installation.
+echo. 1>&2
+echo ERROR: JAVA_HOME is not set and no 'java' command could be found in your PATH. 1>&2
+echo. 1>&2
+echo Please set the JAVA_HOME variable in your environment to match the 1>&2
+echo location of your Java installation. 1>&2
@@ -59,5 +62,5 @@
-echo.
-echo ERROR: JAVA_HOME is set to an invalid directory: %JAVA_HOME%
-echo.
-echo Please set the JAVA_HOME variable in your environment to match the
-echo location of your Java installation.
+echo. 1>&2
+echo ERROR: JAVA_HOME is set to an invalid directory: %JAVA_HOME% 1>&2
+echo. 1>&2
+echo Please set the JAVA_HOME variable in your environment to match the 1>&2
+echo location of your Java installation. 1>&2
@@ -78,1 +81,1 @@
-if "%ERRORLEVEL%"=="0" goto mainEnd
+if %ERRORLEVEL% equ 0 goto mainEnd
@@ -83,2 +86,4 @@
-if  not "" == "%GRADLE_EXIT_CONSOLE%" exit 1
-exit /b 1
+set EXIT_CODE=%ERRORLEVEL%
+if %EXIT_CODE% equ 0 set EXIT_CODE=1
+if not ""=="%GRADLE_EXIT_CONSOLE%" exit %EXIT_CODE%
+exit /b %EXIT_CODE%
